Context: Refers to clothing; a suit or dress worn on the body
Example Sentence: Indosso un abito nuovo per andare al ballo.
Example Sentence English: I wear a new outfit to go to the dance.

Context: Refers to drinking water or water in general
Example Sentence: Vorrei bere un bicchiere di acqua fredda.
Example Sentence English: I would like to drink a glass of cold water.
